comments:
steps to reproduce:

   - create a data source
   - create a data set using the data source
   - create a data item bound to this data set
   - switch to map/highlight panel
   - add a map/highlight condition using "Value of this data item"

expected behavior:

   - map/highlight condition is added

actual behavior:

   - exceptions thrown out in Error Log

1. If the data item doesn't have column binding, the "Value of this data item" is not part of the selectino items.
2. Generate the right expression as row["name_of_columng_binding"]
the problem still exists with map rule in build 20060525, so reopen it

The fixing describe in comments 5 apllied to highlighting only.
Change the mapbuilder also.
